mapper.select: select distinct demand.* , parent.name as name from (select std.stdno as stdno, par.name as name from account par, (select p.* from parent p, (select stdno from demand where classno = ( select classno from class where memno = ( select memno from account where id = #{id})) ) s where p.stdno = s.stdno) std where par.memno = std.memno) parent, (select * from demand where classno = ( select classno from class where memno = ( select memno from account where id = #{id}))) demand where demand.stdno = parent.stdno
